Public Remarks: Embrace the vintage charm of this 1949 3-bedroom, 1-bath Willow Glen bungalow, thoughtfully updated over 30+ years. It has a unique floor plan, including a copycat house across the street, adding character to the neighborhood. Modern comforts blend seamlessly with the past - central heating & air conditioning replace the original floor furnace, double-pane windows add convenience & comfort, the kitchen features cherry cabinets, while the bathroom showcases granite & tile. The family room addition with windows between it and the living room, floods the rooms with natural light. French doors from the primary bdrm. & family room lead to a large patio & Trex deck overlooking the lush & serene backyard home to a fruitful lemon tree. Enjoy a friendly neighborhood near downtown Willow Glen, Wallenberg Park, & the Foxworthy shopping center, offering Zanotto's market & casual dining options. This Willow Glen gem combines nostalgia with modern living, perfect for creating cherished memories.
